headline: EDWARDS VACUUM PUMPING SYSTEM 271 CFM WITH Q-SERIES CONTROLLER
description: Vacuum Pumping System With Q-Series Controller
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model QDP80/QMB500F with Q-Series Controller
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 271.0 CFM (7,657.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 5.30E-4(En) torr (7.07E-4 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 100.0 mm (3.937 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Backing Pump Model QDP80
Roots Pump Model QMB500F
Accessories Gas Module
Exhaust pressure module
Extractable enclosure
Q-Series controller
Other Information Water cooled, 230 L/H recommended flow
Power Requirements 208 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Depth 41.000 in (104.1 cm)
Height 41.000 in (104.1 cm)
Weight 882 lb (400 kg)
